May observation is when you charge gamit yung 20watts nila which I bought it from them is, umiinit yung phone charging from 20-70% like I need to put a fan beside it (normal kasi fast charging gamit mo), pero after 71-100 back to normal na ang temperature. Hindi naman cya nag stotop or notif na sobrang init yung phone while charging. Also, I charge my phone every 25% tas diretso na to 100% no using of it while charging. The charging took 1hr and 45 mins from 25-100% ;very impressive.

P.S: I message the seller to pack it with more bubble wrap since I'm from Visayas and they did grant my requests, very secure. Medyo matagal sila mag ship like after 2-3days ata kaya dapat follow up always.

Sukang puti. Ang sukang puti ay isa sa mabibisang mga sangkap na pamatay ng langgam. Malamang na hindi nila makayanan ang mabagsik na amoy suka. Karagdagan pa, ang amoy ng suka ay nakatatakip sa amoy ng kemikal na iniiwanan ng mga langgam para makasunod ang kasama nila, kaya malilito ang mga langgam sa kanilang direksyon dahil sa amoy ng suka. Maghalo ng magsindaming suka at tubig. Ilagay ang solusyong ito sa spray bottle. I-spray ang solusyon sa mga langgam na papalabas ng bahay o kaya ay may lungga sa ilalim ng lupa.

Performance:Poor customer service and defective item
Best Feature:No best feature hindi user friendly ang phone at napakami.pang ads
Product Quality:Very poor! Isama nyo na ang custome service. Wala kayo aasahan sayang pera sana ba 1k lang yan eh 18k ang phone tapos piandala may issue hindi.naman nila kayamg i-resolve. pag aantayin ka lang. I can send proof kaya kahit kontrahin nyo tong sinabi ko kaya ko mag send proof pag nanghingi kayo.

Ayan yung order ko na Huawei Nova 10 SE. Seller sent the item without sending pics ang bilis dumating pero may issue sa Camera as you can see may black lines na gumagalawa na parang shadow sa camera and pixelated sya. I requested for return/refund then na pick ang item. Pag dating sa warehouse ni-reject naman ang request ko. Sobrang pangit.ng customer service dito specially ang assistance ng shopee customer service inabot na ko ng mahigit 1 month kakasabi na mag antay ako  24-48 buss. Hours para may mag update sakin kasi puro escalation nangyari pero wala nag update sakin. I asked for help dito sa Huawei pero wala naman naitulong and tinatanong pa saan store daw ba ko bumili kahit sinabi ko ng sa store nila dito sa shopee. Nakaka loko kausap. Now, January 9 more than a month na wala pa sakin ang item at take note, chinarge nila ako sa item na wala pa sakin. Mag request ka for udate billing hindi papayag pero wala naman sila magawa sa issue mo. Sira na nga pinadala hidni man lang nag offer to change unit man lang basta reject lang ng request. Very poor customer service at hindi nanko mauulit bumili dito. I opt to buy here kasi para less hassle pero stress lang inabot ko. So, kayo think before you buy muna. Mahirap din gamitin ang phone since wala google play at limited apps lang pede i download. And when you go sa kanilang app store e may mga ads pa. Gift konsana sa sarili ko pero mukang di ko masasabi na deserve ko toh kaso sobrang stress talaga inabot ko at hanggang ngayon wala pa ang phone. Napakahirap makipag coordinate sa seller ata sa shopee mismo.

May pag ka laggy nga lang siya. Pag dating sa apps hindi niya kaya ang PowerPoint yun dapat purpose niya kaya ko to binili but I don't have a choice kundi gamitin ang WPS Office. Sa Internet naman wala problema sakin kasi na'connect ko kaagad kaya walang problema. Legit siya na 256gb and in terms of sound di ko siya bet kasi para siyang nag r'radio. Sa camera naman di ko bet ang front cam pero medyo medyo sa back cam. 

At yun nga gumamit ako ng launcher para gumanda siya kahit papano. Sa TikTok naman okay siya medyo malag din siya maybe depende sa panonoorin mo HAHA

Walkie talkies can be very effective for communication in situations where other methods, such as cell phones or radios, may not be practical or reliable. Walkie talkies are commonly used in outdoor activities, such as camping, hiking, and hunting, as well as in professional settings, such as construction sites, security operations, and event management.

One of the main advantages of walkie talkies is that they do not require a cell phone network or other infrastructure to operate. As long as the walkie talkies are within range of each other, they can communicate effectively. Walkie talkies are also relatively simple to use and can be a cost-effective option for short-range communication needs.

However, the effectiveness of walkie talkies can be impacted by several factors, including the range of the devices, the environment in which they are being used, and the quality of the devices themselves. The range of walkie talkies can vary depending on the specific model and frequency used, with some models capable of transmitting up to several miles while others are limited to only a few hundred feet. The environment in which the walkie talkies are being used can also impact their effectiveness, as obstructions such as buildings or hills can limit the range of the devices. Additionally, the quality of the devices themselves can impact their effectiveness, with more expensive and higher-quality walkie talkies typically offering better range and clearer communication.

The Infinix Moi W1 arrived to compete in the crowded circuit of budget oriented smart watches. The product does exactly what the official site advertised, nothing more nothing less.

That being said.

Don't expect a top of the line smart watch. Yes, you can speak through the watch; but that also means your watch will be your only output.

The details are decently cool, the details are good looking and many apps built-in helps. Even if the touch screen is not a gorilla or AMOLED, it's very responsive and smooth to the touch.

Push notifications are quite hard to read but as I said, for a 999 peso watch, it does exactly what you expect and a bit more. 

Easily could be a nice gift for the kids, or a non picky person.

I recommend the official store. Fast shipping and nice delivery.

Performance:Excellent!
Best Feature:Everything
Product Quality:Excellent!

Pls dont be scared to buy this watch. This watch can last with more than 2 days of continuous usage without charging (turned on continuous measure for heart rate and stress). What's the secret? Go to settings, then "display", then turn off "raise wrist to wake". If tingnan mo sa battery usage, the display screen consumes most of the battery life, kaya lowbatt agad yung sa iba. Yung brightness ng watch is mababa rin kasi chine-check ko lang naman ang heart rate ko. Anyway, I use this 24/7 to mostly check on my heart rate, as well as the number of hours I slept. And yes, aabot toh ng more than 2 days pag naka-turn off ang "raise wrist to wake". Turn off other settings din na di nyo naman palagi ginagamit. In my case, heart rate and stress level is ALWAYS turned ON continuously. Yung measurement sa sleep is automatic naman na naka-monitor. I wear this when I'm sleeping din, literal na 24/7, except when I take a bath. Check video to see kung totoo ba sinasabi ko tungkol sa battery life. At 83%, 11 hours and 15 minutes ang usage time ko since the last time it was fully charged. Take note that I'm wearing this 24/7.

PHILIPPINE HISTORY 

*The first book written in the Philippines was DOCTRINA CRISTIANA.
The Father of Ilocano Literature is PEDRO BUKANEG.
*The Father of Tagalog Poetry is FRANCISCO BALTAZAR.
*Lola Basyang is the pen name of SEVERINO REYES.
*The first and longest running komiks series in the Philippines is KENKOY(Liwayway 
Magasin,1929)
*The Father of Pampango Literature who wrote There is no God is JUAN CRISOSTOMO 
SOTO.
*The oldest existing newspaper in the Philippines since the 1900 is MANILA BULLETIN.
*The Father of Modern Tagalog Poetry is ALEJANDRO ABADILLA.
*The work of Bonifacio which tells the history of the Philippines ANG DAPAT MABATID NG 
MGA TAGALOG.
*He wrote the popular fable The Monkey and the Turtle - JOSE RIZAL
*This is known as Andres Bonifacio's Ten Commandments of the Katipunan - THE 
DECALOGUE.
*Rizal's model for Pilosopong Tasyo was PACIANO RIZAL.
*The following characters created by rizal reflect his own personality except SIMOUN (El 
Filibusterismo)
*The line 'whoever knows not how to love his native tongue is worse than any beast or even 
smelly fish' TO MY FELLOW CHILDREN
*Rizal's pen name - DIMASALANG, LAONG-LAAN
*Taga-ilog is JUAN LUNA's Pen name.
*The first filipino alphabet was called ALIBATA/BAYBAYIN
*This is a song about love - TALINDAW, awit ng mga taong hindi naimbetahan sa kainan 
(COLADO)
*He was known for his `Memoria Fotografica` - JOSE MA. PANGANIBAN *He is known as the 
`poet of the workers or laborers` - AMADO HERNANDEZ
*Ilocano balagtasan is called BUKANEGAN
*Visayan epic about good manners and right conduct - MARAGTAS
*The father of Filipino newspaper is PASCUAL POBLETE
*Lupang Tinubuan is considered to be the best story written during Japanese Period. The 
author is NARCISO REYES
*The original title of Ibong Adarna was CORIDO AT BUHAY NA PINAGDAANAN NG TATLONH 
PRINSIPENG ANAC NG HARING FERNANDO AT REYNA VALERIANA SA CAHARIANG 
BERBANIA
*PANDEREGLA - first filipino bread
The Great Plebian: Andres Bonifacio
The Father of the Katipunan: Andres Bonifacio
Hero of the Tirad Pass Battle: Gregorio Del Pilar
President of the First Philippine Republic: General Emilio Aguinaldo
Brains of the Philippine Revolution: Apolinario Mabini
Martyred Priests in 1872: GOMBURZA
Brains of the Katipunan: Emilio Jacinto
Co-founder of La Independencia: General Antonio Luna
Mother of Balintawak: Melchora Aquino
Greatest Filipino Orator of the Propaganda Movement: Graciano Lopez- Jaena
First Filipino Cannon-maker: Pandar Pira
Managing Editor of La Solidaridad: Mariano Ponce

Customer reviews can have an outsized impact on the perception of your brand. Bad reviews, if steps aren't taken to correct them, draw hundreds of eyes and make potential new customers uneasy about the customer experience you offer.

A good review, however, can be showcased, having the opposite effect of intriguing new users as well as increasing confidence and satisfaction amongst your existing base.

This guide to review excellence will outline 12 examples of how brands successfully upped their review-game, making sure that positive, accurate feedback is the most visible.

PHILIPPINE HISTORY 

*The first book written in the Philippines was DOCTRINA CRISTIANA.
The Father of Ilocano Literature is PEDRO BUKANEG.
*The Father of Tagalog Poetry is FRANCISCO BALTAZAR.
*Lola Basyang is the pen name of SEVERINO REYES.
*The first and longest running komiks series in the Philippines is KENKOY(Liwayway 
Magasin,1929)
*The Father of Pampango Literature who wrote There is no God is JUAN CRISOSTOMO 
SOTO.
*The oldest existing newspaper in the Philippines since the 1900 is MANILA BULLETIN.
*The Father of Modern Tagalog Poetry is ALEJANDRO ABADILLA.
*The work of Bonifacio which tells the history of the Philippines ANG DAPAT MABATID NG 
MGA TAGALOG.
*He wrote the popular fable The Monkey and the Turtle - JOSE RIZAL
*This is known as Andres Bonifacio's Ten Commandments of the Katipunan - THE 
DECALOGUE.
*Rizal's model for Pilosopong Tasyo was PACIANO RIZAL.
*The following characters created by rizal reflect his own personality except SIMOUN (El 
Filibusterismo)
*The line 'whoever knows not how to love his native tongue is worse than any beast or even 
smelly fish' TO MY FELLOW CHILDREN
*Rizal's pen name - DIMASALANG, LAONG-LAAN
*Taga-ilog is JUAN LUNA's Pen name.
*The first filipino alphabet was called ALIBATA/BAYBAYIN
*This is a song about love - TALINDAW, awit ng mga taong hindi naimbetahan sa kainan 
(COLADO)
*He was known for his `Memoria Fotografica` - JOSE MA. PANGANIBAN *He is known as the 
`poet of the workers or laborers` - AMADO HERNANDEZ
*Ilocano balagtasan is called BUKANEGAN
*Visayan epic about good manners and right conduct - MARAGTAS
*The father of Filipino newspaper is PASCUAL POBLETE
*Lupang Tinubuan is considered to be the best story written during Japanese Period. The 
author is NARCISO REYES
*The original title of Ibong Adarna was CORIDO AT BUHAY NA PINAGDAANAN NG TATLONH 
PRINSIPENG ANAC NG HARING FERNANDO AT REYNA VALERIANA SA CAHARIANG 
BERBANIA
*PANDEREGLA - first filipino bread
The Great Plebian: Andres Bonifacio
The Father of the Katipunan: Andres Bonifacio
Hero of the Tirad Pass Battle: Gregorio Del Pilar
President of the First Philippine Republic: General Emilio Aguinaldo
Brains of the Philippine Revolution: Apolinario Mabini

A few things to note:

The original band has protrusions on the far ends of the inner ring. That's where the watch face snaps into place for the band. It keeps it in the proper position at all times (see pic 3).

For the bands that I've ordered, yhere are no such protrusions, so the watch face can be placed at an irregular orientation (see pic 4).

The original band also has a well-designed button for fastening, while the ordered ones only have acrylic plastic without any finishes.

I swapped the buttons around to better fit the aesthetic, and so it's more secure (see pic 2).

Overall, 8.5/10.
